'''Treasure''' is a Quest Item obtained during the {{Quest|The Story of "the Princess" and "the Adventure Team"}}.

During {{Quest|Search in the Algae Sea (Quest)}} it is replaced by [[Unlocked "Treasure"]].

==Trivia==
* This item's icon appears to be an altered version of [[Nymph's Constancy]].
